page.title: Marsh CEO Says Probe Near End
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Marsh McLennan Cos. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MMC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MMC.N</A> will wrap up its probe into its business practices by early January and set aside more than the \$232 million allocated for legal costs last month to settle bid-rigging claims, Chief Executive Michael Cherkasky said.
